questions.question: How did Bonardi and Laudani try to escape the police?

choices.answer: They pretended to be part of the fashion display.

questions.question: What different theories could explain the disappearance of the work.

choices.answer: An art robber took it or someone drank it or someone threw it away.

questions.question: Why were the Pettigrews surprised the bank was open?

choices.answer: Banks don't usually open on Saturday evening in Britain.
Banks don't usually open on Sunday afternoon in Britain.
Banks don't usually open on Saturday afternoon in Britain.
